amendment.description: At the end of division G (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. X. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide assistance to any of the following: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 113 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prevent funds from being given to a list of Palestinian schools named after terrorists.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Gaetz.
